data.title: Gearing up for Maintainer Month!
data.author: GitHub
data.description: Are you looking for ways to support open source maintainers? Maintainer Month is the perfect opportunity!

data.title: Learn about open source governance!
data.author: @shaunagm
data.description: We're collecting resources, guides, exercises, experiments, insights, wisdom and best practices on how to tackle the governance challenges that open source projects face.
